original: ato vipratipattinirākaraṇāya svābhimatadharmyeva yadi bādhyate cettadā sādhya eva tāvanniṣedhyo bhavati,

original: āśrayāsiddhadoṣeṇa yadi asato 'pi naiva kartuṃ pāryate tadā niṣedha eva kasyāpi kathamapi kartuṃ naiva śakyate /

original: yadi prasaṅgasādhanamātreṇaiva niṣedhanātra pravartsyanta ityevaṃ brūyāttadā apramāṇaṃ hi tatra prasaṅgasādhanam /

original: ataḥ āśrayāsiddhādayo doṣāstatra na pravartanta iti cettadā ekānekasvabhāvaviyuktatvakramayaupadyavyāptārthakriyāsāmarthyavirahitatvādo

apakṣa dharma tve pi sādhya avinābhāva mātra hetuḥ sādhya sādhane samarthaḥ

original: niḥsvabhāvatve khalu siddhe āśrayāsiddhadidoṣāṇāṃ tādavasthye 'pi nāsti svapakṣahāniprasaṅgaḥ /

original: buddhau tāvat siddhe 'pi bāhyapradhānādibhirutpattiniṣedhe pradhānādīnāṃ parikalpitasvabhāvaniṣedhastu asiddha eva,

original: kecana tāvadajñāninastriṣu pratisaṃkhyānirodhāsaṃskṛteṣu kasyāpyutpattimattvābhāvaṃ paramārthavasturupeṇa parikalpayanti /

original: tanniṣeghasādhane ca buddhestāvat kathaṃ nāma viṣayibhāvo bhaviṣyati,

original: atha anādikālinasvabījaparipākapariniṣpannabālānāṃ buddhau vidyamāno bāhyavastuvikalpa eva dharmī,

original: sa hi yadyapi [sarvathā] buddhayā parikalpitamātra eva,
